cu.explanation_en: Setting the local S port D to an out-of-range value like 99999 will cause connection failures in the F1 interface.

du.explanation_en: Setting preambleTransMax to 999, which is outside the valid range (0-10), will cause RACH configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 preambleTransMax 設定為 999，這超出有效範圍 (0-10)，會導致 RACH 配置錯誤。
